Name: Solenars Edge Heroes
About the game: An epic series of battles await you in the Arena. Are you strong enough to take them on? Choose your team, purchase weapons, items, armor and other intensive gear to take down all those who stand in your way. Become Alcornagia's greatest Hero in Solenars Edge Heroes. Features: -Original Soundtrack- -60+ playable cast of Solenars Edge Series- -10-Party Member Battles- -Hirable Party Members- -100s of Items to choose from- -Several Monsters to conquer-
